questionTypes.name: Text Area
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require longer answers, you can select formatting options too.

questionTypes.name: Text Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require short, simple answers.

questionTypes.name: Radio Buttons
questionTypes.usageDescription: For multiple choice questions where users select just one option.

questionTypes.name: Check Boxes
questionTypes.usageDescription: For multiple choice questions where users can select multiple options.

questionTypes.name: Select Box
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions with a predefined set of options where users need to select one.

questionTypes.name: Multi-select Box
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions where multiple answers are valid. Allows users to select several options from a predefined list, providing flexibility in responses.

questionTypes.name: Number Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a numeric value.

questionTypes.name: Number Range
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a numerical range (e.g. From/To, Min/Max).

questionTypes.name: Currency Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a monetary amount (e.g. Cost or Budget).

questionTypes.name: Email Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require requre email address(es).

questionTypes.name: URL Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a website, DOI or other URL.

questionTypes.name: Yes/No Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a simple Yes/No response.

questionTypes.name: Date Field
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a date.

questionTypes.name: Date Range
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a date range (e.g. From/To, Start/End)

questionTypes.name: Table
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require a tabular format.

questionTypes.name: Affiliation Search
questionTypes.usageDescription: For questions that require the user to select from a controlled list of institutions.
